item.title: Redis HA on Kubernetes
item.description: I recently had an oppurtunity to setup redis HA on Kubernetes. This was done using the redis-ha stable helm chart. This blog contains details on how the default installation works, observations and few tweaks done to meet our requirements. Note: Check README of the redis-ha chart for installation instructions. Redis-HA Components The typical components required for Redis-HA setup Redis The KV store One takes the responsibility of Master The Replicas syncs data from master using replicaof command.
